nodes.name: Notio

nodes.documentation: @notice constructor sets up Notio address through truffle wizardry

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct DecentraCorpPoA.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref
struct DecentraCorpPoA.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
**@notice Proposal Codes are used to fire specific code. each number represents a different action*** the following are is a list of prop codes and their actions** 1. Funding Proposal: the address entered is the address receiving funding** 2. MemberShip Account Freeze Proposal: the address entered is the address to be frozen** 3. Membership Termination Proposal: the address entered is the address to be terminated
//more options will be added to allow for contract upgrades in the future
nodes.name: createProposal

nodes.documentation:
@notice ideaBlockVote counts the votes and executes and Idea Proposal, adding an idea to the cryptopatent Blockchain
@dev seperate but similiar structures will need to be implemented in the future to stream line voting on different subjects(beta)
nodes.name: executeVote

@dev addMember takes in an address _mem, sets its membership to true and increments their rank by one

@dev mints the user 10,000 NTC
nodes.name: buyMembership
